q:
The Android SDK Command-Line Tools package contains various tools for building and debugging Android apps. Now you have the latest version of SDK command-line tools installed. If you are required to use the previous version of the command-line tools package then which of the following commands will you use if you are updating the command-line tools package through SDK Manager and you have selected your update channel as Beta?

 

Commands:

  1. sdkmanager 'cmdline-tools;latest' --channel=1

     

  2. sdkmanager 'cmdline-tools;latest' --channel=3
In Android, which of the following is not supported by AVM2?
IWhich of the following Android API levels provides IT Pros with management features?
In Android, which of these is added in API level 21?
